```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, comment=NA)
```

# Add Libraries

```{r loadLibraries, message=FALSE}
library(processNC)
library(raster)
library(here)
```

# Get files

```{r getFile}
pa <- paste0(here(), "/data/netcdf/19920816.nc")
print(pa)
```   

```{r makeRaster}
SST <- raster(pa)
SST
```

# Subset Files

```{r makeOrigMatrix}
arr <- as.matrix(SST)
print(dim(arr))
```

```{r cropNatrix}
arr_crop <- arr[350:675, 1275:1700]

print(dim(arr_crop))
```
